page.title: 14Education
page.content: The seven to nine year olds work together,and during the afternoon they work in their classes which are mixed in ages and ability.In the morning the children are streamed according to ability,not age ,and there is one teacher who works with a small group of slower learners with many special teaching aids.Another teacher takes a larger middle ability group ,and the third teacher takes the top ability group. Two of the three classes are in rooms which are next door to each other and have had one section of the wall removed so that more of a team teaching situation can be established.The third room is at the end of a corridor apart from the other two.
